properties.description:
This query tracks changes performed on any of the specified Global Mailing List distro groups. This rule will ONLY create alerts and if a change is made, will be forwarded to the logic app: Notify-Global_Mailing_List_Changes which will email various directors. Reference https://servicedesk.costargroup.com/issues/?filter=-1 

Handling Guidance: https://costar-group-prod-dev.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCSP/pages/390039244/General+Incident+Report+Handling+Guidance

SecurityEvent
| where Activity has "group" and (Activity has "added" or Activity has "removed")
| where TargetAccount has_any (MonitoredGroups)
| extend MemberUserName = extract(@"(CN=)([^,]+)", 2, MemberName)
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Actor = SubjectUserName,
    Activity = split(Activity, '- ')[1],
    MemberUserName,
    GroupChanged = split(TargetUserName, '-')[0]
| extend _AlertTitle = strcat(GroupChanged, " Membership Changed")
| extend _AlertDescription = strcat(
                                 "Time Changed: ",
                                 format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:MM"),
                                 " UTC",
                                 "|",
                                 "Actor: ",
                                 Actor,
                                 "|",
                                 "Activity: ",
                                 Activity,
                                 "|",
                                 "Member User Name: ",
                                 MemberUserName,
                                 "|",
                                 "Group Changed: ",
                                 GroupChanged,
                                 "\n"
                             )
| extend _HandlingGuidance = strcat(
                                 "Evaluate the group membership change identified and who performed the changed.\n",
                                 "Contact the admin who performed the group membership change, and validate that the membership change was approved."
                             )
| project-reorder _AlertTitle, _AlertDescription, _HandlingGuidance
